name: Standing Light Punch
miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

name: Standing Heavy Kick
miscellaneous: 2 frames of recovery added when the attack missesForces a spinning knockdown on Punish Counter

name: Crouching Light Punch
miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

name: Crouching Light Kick
miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

name: Crouching Heavy Punch
miscellaneous: Can be canceled until the 2nd active frame

name: Crouching Heavy Kick
miscellaneous:
Forces a Hard Knock Down when hitting an opponent on the groundKnockdown time extended when attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter
1 frame of recovery added when blocked

name: Jumping Light Kick
miscellaneous: Has cross-up attack properties

name: Jumping Medium Punch
miscellaneous: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

name: Jumping Medium Kick
miscellaneous: Has cross-up attack properties

name: Jumping Heavy Punch
miscellaneous: Forces a slam knockdown on counter or Punish Counter

name: Quick Dash
miscellaneous: Can transition to branching attacks from frame 12

name: Thunder Kick
miscellaneous: Can be canceled into Level 3 Super Art or Critical Art

name: Forward Step Kick
miscellaneous: Can be canceled into any Super Art

name: Triple Flash Kicks (3)
miscellaneous: Always in Punish Counter state during execution

name: L Shoryuken
miscellaneous:
Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 1 - 14Considered airborne from frames 8 - 35
Does 800 individual damage from the 3rd active frame and on

name: M Shoryuken
miscellaneous: Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 1 - 8Considered airborne from frames 9 - 43

name: H Shoryuken
miscellaneous:
Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 1 - 9Invincible to projectiles from frames 5 - 11
Considered airborne from frames 11 - 51

name: OD Shoryuken
miscellaneous: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 10Considered airborne from frames 9 - 24 and 33 - 74

name: [Quick Dash] Shoryuken
miscellaneous:
Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 1 - 12Invincible to projectiles from frames 3 - 12
Considered airborne from frames 9 - 52

name: L Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 5 - 28.

name: M Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 8 - 41

name: H Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 10 - 61

name: OD Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 10 - 77

name: [Quick Dash] Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
miscellaneous: Does not hit the opponent in front of you on the 2nd, 4th, 6th, 8th, and 10th hitsConsidered airborne from frames 10 - 61

name: OD Aerial Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
miscellaneous:
Considered airborne from frames 10 - 77Does not hit the opponent in front of you on the 2nd and 4th attacks
(The 2nd and 4th attacks do 700 damage and increases the Super Art gauge by 600)

name: L Dragonlash Kick
miscellaneous:
Does not hit opponents on the ground from frames 18 - 20Does 950 damage from frames 21 - 23
Considered airborne from frames 9 - 28

name: M Dragonlash Kick
miscellaneous: Does not hit opponents on the ground from frames 23 - 24Considered airborne from frames 14 - 32

name: H Dragonlash Kick
miscellaneous: Does not hit opponents on the ground from frames 28 - 29Considered airborne from frames 19 - 37

name: OD Dragonlash Kick
scaling: Starter scaling 10%,5% combo scaling on the 2nd hit
miscellaneous:
Does not hit opponents on the ground from frames 9 - 12 and 18Considered airborne from frames 10 - 27
Does not have additional combo scaling if the 2nd attack hits

name: [Quick Dash] Dragonlash Kick
scaling: Starter scaling 10%,5% combo scaling on the 2nd hit
miscellaneous:
Does not hit opponents on the ground from frames 9 - 12 and 18 - 19Considered airborne from frames 10 - 28
Does not have additional combo scaling if the 2nd attack hits

name: L Jinrai Kick
miscellaneous: Can transition to Kazekama Shin Kick and Gorai Axe Kick from frames 32 - 35Can transition to Senka Snap Kick from frames 30 - 35

name: M Jinrai Kick
miscellaneous: Can transition to Kazekama Shin Kick and Gorai Axe Kick from frames 32 - 35Can transition to Senka Snap Kick from frames 30 - 35

miscellaneous: Can transition to Kazekama Shin Kick and Gorai Axe Kick from frames 36 - 41Can transition to Senka Snap Kick from frames 34 - 41

name: OD Jinrai Kick
miscellaneous: Can transition to Overdrive Kazekama Shin Kick and Overdrive Gorai Axe Kick from frames 21 - 27Can transition to Overdrive Senka Snap Kick from frames 19 - 27

miscellaneous: Always in Punish Counter state during execution

miscellaneous: Always in Punish Counter state during execution

name: Kasai Thrust Kick
miscellaneous: Always in Punish Counter state during execution

name: SA1 Dragonlash Flame
miscellaneous:
Completely invincible on the 1st frameInvincible to strikes and throws on frames 2 - 9
Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 30%

name: SA2 Shippu Jinrai-kyaku
miscellaneous:
Completely invincible on the 1st frameTransitions to the full attack after the 6th attack
Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 40%

name: SA3 Shinryu Reppa
miscellaneous:
Completely invincible from frames 1 - 18Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 50%

Following properties occur if the first attack is blocked or misses
- Damage is 2100
- Reduces Drive Gauge by 9000 on hit
- Does not go into full cinematic animation
*Can only be canceled into from special moves

name: CA Shinryu Reppa
miscellaneous:
Completely invincible from frames 1 - 18Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter
Minimum guaranteed damage is set to 50%

Following properties occur if the first attack is blocked or misses
- Damage is 2200
- Reduces Drive Gauge by 16000 on hit
- Does not go into full cinematic animation
*Can only be canceled into from special moves

name: Knee Strikes
miscellaneous:
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage
- Super Art gauge increases by 4000
- Forces a hard knockdown

name: Hell Wheel
miscellaneous:
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage
- Super Art gauge increases by 4000
- Forces a hard knockdown

name: Backward Dash
miscellaneous: Invincible to throws from frames 1 - 15

name: Drive Impact: Flame Strike
miscellaneous:
Super Armor for 2 attacks from frames 1 - 27Produces a wall splat if the pushback on hit causes the opponent to connect with the stage wall
On Punish Counter or after a successful hit after Super Armor absorbs a hit, the following properties change:
- Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground
- Forces a spinning knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent
- Super Art gauge increases by 3000

note: (When blocking or during a successful Drive Parry)
name: Drive Reversal: Lightning Crack
Drive Parry
miscellaneous:
Can be canceled from the 4th frame via Drive RushParry hitbox is extended for as long as the buttons are held
Only blocks can be performed during the recovery period
Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

name: Perfect Parry (strike)
miscellaneous:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameFully invincible for 6 frames once recovery is over (invincibility not granted if you continue the parry)
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

name: Perfect Parry (projectile)
miscellaneous:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameNo screen freeze occurs.
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

name: Parry Drive Rush
miscellaneous:
Screen freeze occurs on the 10th frameCan be canceled into an attack on the 9th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 24th frame

name: Cancel Drive Rush
miscellaneous:
Screen freeze occurs on the 9th frameCan be canceled into an attack from the 10th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 25th frame
